title: Artist Profile: Claire Boyd
content:
Claire Boyd’s room for the Slade Degree show saw three video projections onto sheets, hung above some quite deflted balloons and green paint smeared on the walls.

The insane overload of tumblr shit, shakey selfy videos, your mum jokes and solarised home videos was obnoxious, mesmerising and hilarious. The artist statement read: L☺L

Here are some videos we took of the installation

And from Claire’s site youjustgotboyd.com

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lND5_jkqMhE&feature=player_embedded
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d43
